pkgmetadata.longdescription: Machine Learning Models for Predicting Claim Counts // Prediction of claim counts using the feature based development factors introduced in the manuscript Hiabu M., Hofman E. and Pittarello G. (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2312.14549. Implementation of Neural Networks, Extreme Gradient Boosting, and Cox model with splines to optimise the partial log-likelihood of proportional hazard models.
